comment: His teaching style is so unique but it captures the student's attention. He is raw and he does not sugar coat anything. If you are a cry baby or immature don't take the class. His lectures and teaching style may offend you but he wants you to be open minded. Think outside the box. Respect him, come to glass, and you will enjoy it. Amazing Teacher!

Carmon is one of the most powerful professors I have ever had the pleasure of taking. Took him at U of Memphis for Sociology. He is incredibly energetic, driven, and potent with sociological everrrything. I wish it were possible to download peoples' brains because he would be numero uno for me. Plus he is fioneeee

I took Mr. Carmon during his first semester at U of M so he was kind of all over the place. His teaching style is also all over the place, but he really knows the material and is very passionate about it. As long as you read thoroughly, passing the tests will be easy. All testsquizzes are online. No papers, no extra assignments.

Carmon is the BEST!!! he keeps the class interesting with debates and world views outside the box. Sometimes his homework or projects aren't clear but for the most part show up because he's BIG on attendance and you will do fine.

Oh, Carmon. He's a character...that's for sure! I enjoyed his class, but I felt like I really didn't learn anything substantial. It was entertaining though! I think he was just ready to quit teaching this past semester that is why he was more lax. All tests are online, open book (but timed) Easy A if you attempt to be interested.

i have to admit i was a little nervous at 1st b/c i didn't know what to think of him, but i loved every bit of his class and made an effort to go every time. i had him in the morning and he was great at waking up the whole class and energizing our sleepy minds. keeps you laughing through the whole semester and i love his teaching style. great guy!

I usually don't mind having to miss class, but I found myself doing my best to show up to every class because it was amazing. He says things that might offend some people, like calling a girl Britney Spears or making fun of girl's high voices, but it is so funny and he doesn't mean to hurt feelings. Carmon's grading was very fair.

God, he's so hot. And intelligent. And introspective. He challenges you to face the cold, hard facts of our society - even if it makes you uncomfortable. I've learned so much from him. He hands out A's like candy but it's totally worth it - you're never forced to learn, but you WANT to. Such an incredible human being. I wish I could take him again.

I made an A in this class. Easy A. Timed online tests (90 questions/90 minutes). You just have to know what chapters the tests cover and try to find the answer in the book or from your notes when you're doing the tests. Very interactive class. Do not take if you're easily offended. But really, you shouldn't be offended. CARMON IS AWESOME! TAKE HIM!
Carmon is incredible!  He's fun and easy going.  He relates to the student so well!  One of the most fun classes I've ever had...sad that it was 1/2 semester though.  Overall, highly recommended!!

Mr. Carmon made this class very fun and interesting.  Unlike most of my other professors at KSU, I actually wanted to attend every class with Mr. Carmon.  I would highly recommend him, and would gladly take another class with him.  We need more teachers like him. Very engaging and entertaining. Interactive class.  No regrets!

Carmon was awesome. You have to really study for the tests but he has a great teaching style and makes the class interesting. The examples he uses in class are great for helping you remember info on tests. There are discussions in class and on WebCT which aren't bad. The board was giving him a hard time about his style, but i loved it

AMAZING TEACHER. you will never get bored in his class. i love this ninja turtle comment b/c it's so true! read the book! overall he is so much fun! debates are interesting and you have to do something horrible in order for him to not like you! i freakin love carmon! "who am i?" "carmon!" "and what are we here for?" "sociology!" woooo!

GREASTEST TEACHER ever to be at KSU...He really makes a boring class very interesting. Great debates, really gets into real issues..Best class you will ever have!! Would take him over and over again!!!
He has a great way of making a potentially boring subject lively and interesting. He is very enthusiastic and animated, and the class is interactive.  I enjoy going to this class.

He is AMAZING! You would be an idiot to take anyone else for SOCI. This was my best class thus far! Young, attractive, energetic, and educated. AMAZING! There was never a dull moment and to top it off, I have a new look on society.
this teacher is hilarious!!!makes it so interesting, always has the craziest and funniest storiessss!takee himm!!you wont regret it!best teacher everrrrr!

Possibly the greatest teacher to ever grace the halls of Kennesaw! Easy to understand and also very aware of our society and doesn't sugar coat anything! He is as real as it gets!! This class is a guaranteed A as long as you pay attention, participate and skim the book every once in a while! Also he actually makes the class fun! Highly recommended!

Best teacher i've ever had! Not afraid to talk about the issues and strongly dominates his uses of his first amendment rights! Had a lot of fun in his class and recommend it to anyone! Read as much and make sure to participate as much as possible and you have an easy A. The first class I ever took that was actually enjoyable AND thought provoking!

2 thumbs up, fine holiday fun. His class is interesting to say the least. Carmon is always willing to talk about what no one else would ever say. It keeps things lively. READ YOUR BOOK. Probably 40% of the questions on tests come from the text. Plus, he sounds like a Ninja Turtle. It's fun to listen to him talk!! Participate and you're in!
Great professor! Very knowledgeable and has a great approach to teaching. I would take again if he taught another subject. Class is always entertaining and enlightening.

Great Class!! You're grade depends on how much he likes you and the three test he gives throughout the semester. Study a little and get involved and you'll do fine. He makes you want to go to class even though you don't have to. I got a lot of good stories from taking this class!! haha.

This is the best class I've taken so far.  I sure wished that he taught more than Sociology. He is really big on class participation, and will hound you until he gets some kind of interaction. That's definitely not a bad thing though. His tactics insure the retention of the course materials.  Loved it!

FUN CLASS if you are social. If you're shy he'll try to work it out of you. Not difficult, but the tests can be a bit overwhelming if you haven't opened your text. If I had to take the class again, I'd take him.
